Title: Provides for the reimbursement for certain corrective lenses
Summary: Provides that group health insurance policies offered in the large group market that is issued, amended, or renewed in this state shall provide coverage for corrective lenses used to correct the sight of individuals medically diagnosed with color vision deficiency.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the insurance law, in relation to providing reimbursement for certain corrective lenses used to correct color vision deficiency
